titleStmt.title: Bad TEI example of Johnson's entry 'Lexicographer'

publicationStmt.p: Data for the DARIAH-Campus course "Transforming Lexicographic Data: XSLT for Dictionary Nerds"

sense.def: A writer of dictionaries; a harmless drudge, that busies himself in tracing the original, and detailing the signification of words.
sense.quote: Commentators and lexicographers acquainted with the Syriac language, have given these hints in their writings on scripture.
sense.author: Watts.
